fields.name: reference_number
fields.title: Reference Number
fields.description: This field is populated by the user with the reference number of the Experiment. This number is a mandatory system requirement when publishing a template.

fields.name: titre_du_projet_en
fields.title: Project Title (English)
fields.description: This field describes the project title, in English

fields.name: question_de_recherche_en
fields.title: Research Question (English)
fields.description: This field describes the research question informing the project, in English

fields.name: project_summary_en
fields.title: Project Summary (English)
fields.description: This field summarizes the key information about the project, including any findings once the initiative is completed, in English

fields.name: last_updated
fields.title: Last Updated
fields.description: This field will display the latest update provided for the project.

fields.name: experimental_area
fields.title: Experimental area
fields.description: This field will display the area in which the experiment is taking place.

fields.name: research_design
fields.title: Design
fields.description: This field will describe the research design used for the project.

fields.name: design_details_en
fields.title: Design Details (English)
fields.description: This field will describe the details of the research design used for the project.

fields.name: intervention_en
fields.title: Intervention (English)
fields.description: This field will describe the intervention tested in the project.

fields.name: mesure_des_resultats_en
fields.title: Outcomes (English)
fields.description: This field will describe the intervention tested in the project.

fields.name: resultats_en
fields.title: Findings (English)
fields.description: This field will describe the outcomes measured in the project.

fields.name: status
fields.title: Status
fields.description: This field will describe the status of the project.

fields.name: lead_branch_en
fields.title: Lead Branch and/or Unit (English)
fields.description: This field describes the organizational structure tied to the project owner (if applicable), in English

fields.name: info_supplementaire_en
fields.title: Further Information / Links (English)
fields.description: This field includes a URL link to additional information on the project (e.g. report, blog post, etc.), in English.
